message:
http://www.meetup.com/socalmartiallawalerts/messages/boards/thread/10754960

Suspicious Activity Report!


Observed by ﻿Tim﻿ on April 26, 2011 at approximately 3:20 p.m.:


Military convoy sighted Tuesday, April 26th, Pismo Beach, CA, HWY 101 South, approx 3:20 pm. Large green camo tractor trailers carrying smaller to medium size "caterpillar type: earthmoving equipment, similar to bobcats. About 5 to 8 of these, plus green camo dump trucks.


[hr]


Followup comment by Kim M.:


Probably came from Camp SLO? They have a huge stockpile of earth moving equip (or used to, before they started moving everything around last 6 months, or so...) Good catch. THANKS!
